title: Authorizes suspension or revocation of driving privileges in this state upon conviction of procuring alcoholic beverages for a person under the age of twenty-one
summary: Authorizes suspension or revocation of driving privileges in this state upon conviction of procuring alcoholic beverages for a person under the age of twenty-one.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to penalties for procuring alcoholic beverages for persons under the age of twenty-one
